title: Global Trade Finance Banker (m/f) - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: W
body:
Our client, a major international bank active in Vienna, is looking for an experienced and highly motivated person for the following position:

Global Trade Finance Banker (m/f/d)

Part of the Global Transaction Banking business line, the Trade Service team is promoting, managing and developing Trade Finance solutions for corporate clients in close cooperation with the Coverage team, the global Trade Finance network of the bank and other departments of the bank.
The Global Trade Finance Banker will be responsible for the origination and execution of high value Trade Finance transactions and the development of Trade Finance solutions.

Main Responsibilities:

  • Initiates and develops trade business with corporate clients
  • Originates trade finance solutions for strategic clients (pitching solutions, presenting transactions to management, risk department, compliance, etc.)
  • Interacts and actively co-operates with Coverage Bankers, the other Trade Finance teams and other business lines of the bank
  • Ensure proper execution of transactions by back and middle office
  • Follows up on operational issues with Back office teams and support functions (Compliance, Legal, Risk)
  • Keeps abreast of innovation in trade finance and understands clients moves and expectations

Your Profile:

  • Bachelor or Master´s degree in Finance or Business Administration
  • In-depth knowledge of traditional trade finance products (L/Cs, guarantees etc.) and good understanding of the risk drivers of the trade business
  • Experience in dealing with large multinational corporate clients and corporate relationship managers
  • Fluency in English and German (orally and written) additional languages are of advantage
  • Proficiency in MS Office
  • Ability to spot, understand and solve issues, develop and recommend alternatives or solutions
  • Good interpersonal skills - proven ability to build and develop relationships both internally and externally
  • Well organized with very good attention to detail and high communications skills

According to the collective agreement the gross salary is from € 80.000 per annum. Our Client is offering overpayment depending on qualification and work experience.

If you are ready to meet the above mentioned requirements, we are looking forward to receiving your comprehensive application documents in English preferably through our ISG-Karriereportal or via email with reference to 75.903.
